author: John Doe
title: How I started Blogging
content: I started blogging to document my learning. Over time I discovered that writing helped me think clearly and people responded to my honest experiences. In this post I share the first steps, mistakes and tips to remain consistent.

author: Priya Sharma
title: Top 5 React Tips
content: React Hooks changed everything. Here are five practical tips I use every day: 1) prefer small hooks, 2) memoize values that cost to compute, 3) keep effects focused, 4) use reducers for complex state, 5) test hooks with simple components.
